Translations.Text: S yitri mara ixeppi
Ur innetlaf, ur i$liv umeddakwel nnwen
Ur d iqqao akken i s ihwan
D aweeei kan, id ippuweeean
Islemd it bab n tezmert iqwan
D bab n tezmert irs ed
u neppa di lejba aalayen
Sinna iqeob ed, ippucengel
atan tasurift n sin ixtucen, ne$ ur tebbwiv
D$a iweeea i umdan iS, ayen iweeea
Ur iskaddeb wul deg wayen iwala
Day a t tnaqwmem, $ef wayen iwala
Ni$ ieoa t di trusi s nniven
ar tedxwent n talast
u$uo illa leonan usemlili
Mi tesbur tedxwent ta$wlaft
ur iwweonenni yieoi, ur izgir
Ni$ iwala kra issekniyen imeqwoaeanen, n Mass is
Twalam Allat akked Lauzza
Akked Manat, tis krav nniven
Day i kunwi ddkeo, i Neppa nnta
Wagi, ihi, d beiiu aneeyaf
Wigi d ismawen kan i sent tefkam, kunwi akked imezwura nnwen. Ur sent d Issers Oebbi kra udabu. Iiafaoen kan nnwaya, akked wayen cehwant teowiein. Ni$ tusa ten id nnhaya s$uo Mass nnsen
Aani, i umdan, ayen issaram
Tamezwarut akked tneggarut, n Oebbi
Aceal n lmalayek deg igenwan, ur d teppawi acemma ccafuaa nnsent, siwa deffir tsrie n Oebbi, $ef win Ib$a u Iouva
Ih, wid ur numin ara di laxeot, ppaken i lmalayek ismawen n nnta
Ur sain fellas kra n tmusni. Iiafaoen kan nnwaya. Wanag nnwaya ur tebbwi acemma si tidep
Ihi, eoo win iwexxoen i usmekti nneÂ£, i ib$an kan tudert n ddunit
D aya ay sen tefka tmusni. Mass ik, war ccekk, Ieoa sennig akw, anwa innetlafen seg ubrid iS; Ieoa sennig akw, anwa i ipwanhan
N Oebbi ayen akw illan deg igenwan, illan di tmurt. Ad Iqeiii wid ifalian $ef wayen xedmen, ad Ioazi wid issweqmen, s uuam

Wid ijunben ibekkaven ibararen akked tucmitin, siwa lfaliat fessusen, ihi, d uwsia ssmae n Mass ik. Neppa Issen ikwen sennig akw, mi kwen id Ixleq seg wakal, mi tellam d icelleqluqen, deg iaabbav n tyimmatin nnwen. Ur staamilet tezdeg deg iman nnwen! Neppa Ieoa sennig akw, anwa ieezzben
Twalav win iwexxoen
i ifkan cwii, iccueen
Day isaa tamusni n tbavnit, d$a iwala
Ne$ ur ippuxebbeo $ef tewoiqin n Musa
Akked Iboahim ineueen
Ur ipbibbi yiwen taakkwemt n wayev
I umdan, siwa ayen inki
Ankay is a t iwali
Sinna, a t Ikafi s lufa
Ih, ar Mass ik, taggara
D Neppa i Issevuan, i Issruyen
D Neppa i Ineqqen, i Issidiren
D Neppa i Ixelqen tayuga, ddkeo akked nnta
Si tiqqit n l$ella ma tuzzel
FellaS, axlaq nniven
D Neppa i I$ennun, i Iqenaan
D Neppa i d Mass n Ciara
D Neppa i Isnegren Aad imezwura
Si Tamud, ur d Iooi ara
Agdud n Nue, uqbel nnsen, war ccekk, iugar iten ddens, lbbwe$v
Issenger tid inneqlaben
Idel iten s wayen idellen
Anta talalt n Mass ik ara tnamerev
Wagi d aneddao seg ineddaoen n zik
A d taee tin d ippaeeen
War Oebbi, ur illi ara p id issdehoen
Iswehm ikwen wawal a
La tdessem ur la tepprum
Kunwi di zzhu
Knut i Oebbi, aabdet
